definition[0]: a holiday organized by a company at a fixed price that includes the cost of travel, hotel etc
example[0]: a cheap package deal to Tenerife
definition[1]: an offer or agreement which includes several things that you must buy or accept together
example[1]: The Commission attempted to bring all three proposals into one package deal.
definition[2]: an offer or agreement that includes several things that must all be accepted together
example[2]: The cable provider is to sign up five global advertisers for the package deal.
